string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Description : Pisang Ambon is a large banana with sweet flavor, often eaten fresh or used in desserts. \n Benefits: High in vitamins B6 and C, helps in improving digestion and provides quick energy.

Description: Pisang Barangan has red skin when ripe and a sweet taste, commonly found in traditional markets. \n Benefits: Rich in antioxidants, beneficial for heart health and helps in maintaining healthy blood pressure levels.

Description: Pisang Cavendish is widely recognized internationally, with smooth yellow skin and very sweet taste. \n Benefits: Excellent source of potassium which is essential for heart health, muscle function, and blood pressure regulation.

Description: Pisang Kepok is a stubby, thick-skinned banana often used for cooking, especially in fried dishes or banana chips. \n Benefits: High fiber content aids digestion, provides a good source of carbohydrates for sustained energy release.
Description: Pisang Nangka is known for its aromatic flavor and is often used in cooking. \n enefits: Rich in vitamins and minerals, helps in improving digestion, and provides a natural energy boost.
Description: Pisang Raja is often used in traditional Indonesian dishes and has a unique sweet tast \n Benefits: Contains high levels of vitamin A, which is good for vision and immune system support.
Description: Pisang Susu is smaller in size with a sweet and creamy texture. \n Benefits: Good source of essential vitamins and minerals, helps in maintaining healthy bones and skin. Pisang Tanduk

resources.string: As an informatics student and mobile development enthusiast, I have a passion for creating beautiful and functional apps for users. I write code primarily in Kotlin, which is a popular programming language for Android development. My focus is on creating visually appealing and intuitive user experiences that make using the app a pleasure.
Classify banana species effortlessly by either capturing a photo with your camera or selecting an existing image from your gallery.
